content.raw:
The [UNIT_ModelListWidget_TEST](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/GazeboDefault/job/gazebo-ci-default-homebrew-amd64/36/testReport/(root)/ModelListWidget_TEST/) is currently passing on the default branch in homebrew jenkins.

It is proposed in pull request #2116 to change the list of tests subject to the `ENABLE_SCREEN_TESTS`. As a strange side-effect of this pull request, the [test is now failing](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/113/testReport/(root)/ModelListWidget_TEST/LinkProperties/). I note that this is strange because the test was already being run on jenkins homebrew and was passing before. This pull request only changes the order in which this test is run, and now it fails.
content.html:
The UNIT_ModelListWidget_TEST is currently passing on the default branch in homebrew jenkins.

It is proposed in pull request #2116 to change the list of tests subject to the ENABLE_SCREEN_TESTS. As a strange side-effect of this pull request, the test is now failing. I note that this is strange because the test was already being run on jenkins homebrew and was passing before. This pull request only changes the order in which this test is run, and now it fails.
